Message.En: Shield Sage Tactics Trial: A Magick Shield
Message.Jp: Shield Sage Tactics Trial: A Magick Shield

Message.En:
In order to learn the basic tactics of Shield Sage,
challenge the trial of the Training Chapel
Message.Jp:
In order to learn the basic tactics of Shield Sage,
challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

Message.En: Speak with White Knight at the base of the cliff before Training Chapel
Message.Jp: Speak with White Knight at the base of the cliff before Training Chapel

Message.En: Speak with Wilson in Training Chapel
Message.Jp: Speak with Wilson in Training Chapel

Message.En: Attack the enemy with Shield Blow
Message.Jp: Attack the enemy with Shield Blow

Message.En: Use the "Attract" skill to get the enemy's attention
Message.Jp: Use the "Attract" skill to get the enemy's attention

Message.En: Block an enemy attack to charge your Force Gauge
Message.Jp: Block an enemy attack to charge your Force Gauge

Message.En: Fill your Force Gauge, then attack the enemy with Force Burst
Message.Jp: Fill your Force Gauge, then attack the enemy with Force Burst

Message.En: Fill in your Force Gauge and enchant
Message.Jp: Fill in your Force Gauge and enchant

Message.En: Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum
Message.Jp: Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum

Message.En: Collect the proof of completing the trial
Message.Jp: Collect the proof of completing the trial

Message.En: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
Message.Jp: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
